name: Logikview Analytics
description:
Logikview Analytics Pvt. Ltd.  is a new-age Big Data analytics firm based at Indore. We serve as a strategic partner to our clients where we consult, and offer wide range of quick-start Analytics solutions to myriad industries like telecom, retail, finance, manufacturing, health care, CPG etc. The quick start solutions are for customer 360 degrees engagement, or for resource optimization in marketing or manufacturing.
Logikview has started formal operations only in last 14 months. In a short journey it has done some critical projects and PoCs. MP government is also a buyer and user of Logikview’s product.
Logikview has developed an integrated self-service analytical platform on Hadoop and Apache Spark for users to ingest, prepare and analyze data. With out of box connectors to numerous data sources - including Hadoop, Amazon Redshift, Amazon S3, Google BigQuery,  relational databases, excel sheets, flat files etc. - it gives users direct access to their data to perform deep dive exploration. It provides a self-service data preparation engine for users to perform data cleaning and enrichment on the fly. Using its drag and drop functionality, user can quickly visualize their data and interactively find hidden insights in it
READ MORE...
